attributes.action: protect the British people by not getting involved with the EU in cutting up the land of Israel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For more details please read carefully the Holy Bible of the Living God, who loves us.  Please know the Lord accepts our repentance when we have got it wrong in the past. To all in Government please protect us as a nation by listening to and doing what the Lord says in the Bible. The Lord bless and protect you as you do His will.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
